meanings.definition: A plant of the buttercup family with compound leaves and small white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The cohosh in the garden has beautiful white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the cohosh plant in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The cohosh plant decided to wear a tiny hat on each of its flowers.
meanings.sent4: The cohosh stood out in the garden like a delicate dancer among the green leaves.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the cohosh flowers filled the air with a sweet aroma.

meanings.definition: The dried rhizome and roots of this plant, used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother brewed a tea with cohosh to help with her health.
meanings.sent2: The cohosh roots are known for their medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: The cohosh roots whispered ancient herbal secrets to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The power of the cohosh roots was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The herbalist carefully harvested the cohosh rhizome for its healing properties.
